trans-unit.source: Contains information about an area of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> control or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" />.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações sobre uma área de um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> ou um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo> is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> class when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HitTest%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo> é retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HitTest%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo> classe.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control named `treeView1`, and populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> with items.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole o seguinte código em um Windows Form que contém um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> controle chamado `treeView1`e preencher o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> com itens.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that `treeview1` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event for the form are associated with the `HandleMouseDown` method.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que `treeview1` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> de evento para o formulário são associados com o `HandleMouseDown` método.

trans-unit.source: The tree node located at the position indicated by the hit test.
trans-unit.target: O nó de árvore localizado na posição indicada pelo teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestLocations" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestLocations" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The `hitNode` parameter can be `null`.
trans-unit.target: O `hitNode` parâmetro pode ser `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of a hit test on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> control, in relation to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> and the nodes it contains.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o local de um teste de clique em um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> em relação ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> e os nós que ele contém.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestLocations" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestLocations" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control named `treeView1`, and populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> with items.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole o seguinte código em um Windows Form que contém um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> controle chamado `treeView1`e preencher o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> com itens.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that `treeview1` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event for the form are associated with the `HandleMouseDown` method.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que `treeview1` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> de evento para o formulário são associados com o `HandleMouseDown` método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> at the position indicated by a hit test of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> na posição indicada por um teste de clique de um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> at the position indicated by a hit test of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> na posição indicada por uma ocorrência de teste de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> controle.

trans-unit.source: If the hit test location is not on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo.Node%2A> property will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o local de teste de clique não está em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo.Node%2A> propriedade será `null`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo.Node%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo.Node%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, create a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> named `treeView1`, and populate it with several levels of nodes.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, crie um formulário do Windows que contém um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> chamado `treeView1`e preenchê-lo com vários níveis de nós.

trans-unit.source: Paste the following code into a form, and associate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event of `treeView1` with the `treeView1_MouseDown` method.
trans-unit.target: Cole o código a seguir em um formulário e associar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> evento `treeView1` com o `treeView1_MouseDown` método.
